I'm not a vegetarian, but lately I find that vegetarian meals are just plain better.  Anyway, this theory led my girlfriend and me to Teresa Carles.  I will simply say this:  We were in Barcelona for 7 days, and I would have eaten here every night (my girlfriend kept bothering me about how "we have to try other places!").  Great food and a welcome detour from the typical tapas places everywhere else in Barcelona.
